text: Mary Winifred Gloria Hunniford (born 10 April 1940) is a Northern Irish television and radio presenter, broadcaster and singer. She is known as an anchor on Rip Off Britain and Loose Women. She was a reporter on This Morning and The One Show with all programmes on one of the BBC and ITV channels. She also had a singing career between the 1960s and 1980s. Category:1940 births Category:Living people
title: Gloria Hunniford
